traits.Pack Tactics: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.
actions.Scimitar: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
